content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOWN THE GAME\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"‘Own the Game’ is the strategy that guides adidas through to 2025 – a plan rooted in sport. Sport is adidas’ past, present, and future. ‘Own the Game’ puts the consumer at the heart of everything they do. The strategic focus is on increasing brand credibility, elevating the experience for our consumers, and pushing the boundaries in sustainability. The execution of their strategy is enabled by a mindset of innovation across all dimensions of the business as well as their digital transformation. Adidas own the game and will drive significant growth. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To watch a recording of the 'Own the Game' presentation, which happened on 10 March 2021, or to access more strategy-related resources, please click \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.adidas-group.com/en/strategy/summary/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":934956,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/db3a40f8-e6cf-4c80-ad38-fb26c7883ea7/Screenshot_395.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/db3a40f8-e6cf-4c80-ad38-fb26c7883ea7/Screenshot_395.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot_395.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot_395.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"db3a40f8-e6cf-4c80-ad38-fb26c7883ea7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":689,\"height\":389},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adidas consumers are at the heart of ‘Own the Game’. Consumers drive structural trends in the industry through their preferences and behaviors. They strive to live active and healthy lives, they wish to blend sport and lifestyle, and they are digital by default as well as sustainable by conviction. ‘Own the Game’ will be ready to capture those consumer-driven opportunities and carve out new ones for their benefit. In 2025, ‘Own the Game’ will not only have delivered overproportionate growth for adidas but also deepened relationships with their consumers, as adidas continues to actively live their purpose ‘through sport, we have the power to change lives’.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ADIDAS STRATEGIC FOCUS AREAS:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CREDIBILITY \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas is a leading brand thanks to our credibility in both sport and culture. To continue to excite their consumers with innovative concepts that support adidas mission, they will sharpen adidas brand, refine their product offering, and leverage partnerships to further enhance their  credibility with consumers. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WOMEN\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas goal is to grow currency-neutral net sales for our Women’s business at a mid-teens rate per annum on average until 2025, thereby significantly increasing the Women’s share of their overall business. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SPORT\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas focus on the most important sport categories: Football, Training, Running, and Outdoor. Football is the biggest sport in terms of viewership while Running, Training, and Outdoor are the biggest participation sports. Their products in these categories are built for sport and worn for sport. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EXPERIENCE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To grow long-term relationships with our consumer, adidas excite and empower them by creating personalized experiences in both digital and physical spaces. With this in mind, adidas will accelerate their transformation into a direct-to-consumer-led (DTC-led) business built around membership\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"STRATEGIC MARKETS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas will double down on Greater China, North America, and EMEA to bring exciting consumer experiences to life, pursuing a tailored approach that appeals to local trends. Their ambition is to gain market share in all three strategic markets.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SUSTAINABILITY \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas commitment to sustainability is truly holistic and deeply embedded into how they have done business for over two decades. It’s rooted in the purpose that, ‘through sport, we have the power to change lives’. As adidas continue to pioneer in sustainability, they will move from strong stand-alone initiatives to a scaled and comprehensive sustainability program.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
